info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 16 at 11:10PM MDT until September 17 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN DONA ANA COUNTY...
At 1110 PM MDT, Moderate to heavy rain continues to fall over the Vado Arroyo watershed. Emergency management reports flooding has made roads impassable in the Vado area. Runoff from the High Valley area will continue to cause flooding in Vado and Del Cerro even after the rain abates.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Vado. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low lying areas, streets, and arroyos.
Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Vado and Del Cerro.
info.instruction:
This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 1:30 AM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 1:30 AM MDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 1:30 AM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:30 AM MDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
